infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshelldepletedfu: More powerful than steel shells, with better armor-piercing ability, and can cause radiation to the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellaphep: A railgun armor-piercing shell. Able to penetrate the ship's hull and detonate, equipped with a proximity fuze.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellapfsds: A reloadable railgun shell. Fires a high-speed steel dart that penetrate the hull and armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellacid: A defensive railgun shell loaded with special acid, spraying its content on its trace after launch. Good for hunting small creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.railguncanistershellex: A reloadable railgun shell. Loaded with explosive pellets.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgundecoydroppershe: A defensive railgun shell that drops up to 5 explosive decoys on its trace after launch.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellfixfoam: A defensive railgun shell that releases multiple fixfoam pellets on your submarine. Can be used for emergency hull fix.
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxexplosi: Ammo for chaingun. Explodes on hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxspread: Scattering ammo for chaingun. Effective against unarmored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxstun: Ammunition for the coilgun. Explodes and stuns targets on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.flakcannonshockammobox: A heavy box of wide-spread electric shock ammo for the Flak Cannon. Good against swarms.
infotexts.entitydescription.flakcannondirectionalp: A heavy box of low spread armor-piercing ammo for the Flak Cannon. Good against targets behind walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulselaserammoboxmixed: A mix-up of two types of fulgurium pulse laser ammo, switches lens mode after each shot. Containing twice as much fuel.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulselaserammoboxpierc: A box containing a special concoction of chemicals and rare materials. The lens focuses laser to improve penetration, allowing the laser to hit targets behind walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.acidmistbomb: A bomb containing special acid, can be put into a railgun shell for creature hunting.
infotexts.entitydescription.empbomb: A bomb designed to destroy electrical devices, can be put into a railgun shell.
